item.title: [HBASE-12585] Fix refguide so it does hbase 1.0 style API everywhere with callout on how we used to do it in pre-1.0
item.description:
Over in HBASE-12400, made a start on this project writing up how the new HBase 1.0 API looks. I started in on the refguide removing all HTable references replacing with new style and in the hbase client chapter added leadoff that has users go get a cluster Connection first....

Doing a thorough job of rinsing the doc of old style foregrounding the new mode is a big job.

Misty Stanley-Jones Any chance of help on this one? Thanks boss.
